getUpdateScriptClassPathTemplate

protected String getUpdateScriptClassPathTemplate()
Description copied from class: UpdatableDatabaseOpenHelper
Used by the Update Script Loader engine. Return the update script _2 class name. Example: 

protected String getUpdateScriptClassPathTemplate() {
        return WebCacheUpdateScript_2.class.getName();
}

Specified by:
